pr_title: Add Observability Improvement Changes to Master Branch

timeline.message:
Merge pull request #23794 from nadundesilva/choreo-observability

Minor improvements to Observability Improvements branch

Merge pull request #23831 from ballerina-platform/master

Sync observability improvements branch with master branch

Add support to drop "0" status codes from metrics

# Ideally 0 status codes cannot happen (unless there is a bug), therefore the condition was updated to check whether the status code is greater than or equals to 100

Merge pull request #23850 from nadundesilva/choreo-observability

Add support to drop "0" status codes from metrics
Add ballerina version to AST JSON

Fix Scheduler.getStrand() call order to avoid unwanted contention

# When observability is switched off even (in the previous code) the strand was accessed for no reason. This was changed so that the call can be completely avoided.
Move all constant loading to module init function
Add check to avoid ballerina level observability logic when observability is disabled
Revert moving async function wrapper to package level
Fix code review suggestions

Merge pull request #24060 from nadundesilva/choreo-observability

Performance Improvements for Observability Instrumentation
Merge remote-tracking branch 'upstream/master' into sync

Merge pull request #24005 from a5anka/ballerrina-version-in-ast

Add ballerina version to AST JSON

Merge pull request #24109 from nadundesilva/sync

Sync observability improvements branch with master branch

Merge pull request #24165 from ballerina-platform/master

Sync observability-improvements branch with master branch
Revert changes done to ballerina-rt for Choreo
Add ballerina-choreo-extension-rt jar to the Ballerina distribution

Add build time flag to package Choreo extension

# By default it is not packaged
Add Ballerina.toml support for packaging Choreo extension
Move Choreo specific SPI information from ballerina-rt to ballerina-choreo-extension-rt

Merge pull request #24152 from nadundesilva/choreo-build-time-flag

Add build time flag to control packaging Choreo Extension

timeline.bodyText: There are cases like running unit tests, where we skip copying libs from distribution using 'skipCopyLibsFromDist' flag. You might need to use 'skipCopyLibsFromDist' in CopyChoreoExtensionTask. Lets see  if unit tests failed.
timeline.author: warunalakshitha
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -413,8 +424,10 @@ public void execute() {
                 .addTask(new CreateBaloTask(), isSingleFileBuild)   // create the BALOs for modules (projects only)
                 .addTask(new CreateBirTask())   // create the bir
                 .addTask(new CopyNativeLibTask())    // copy the native libs(projects only)
+                .addTask(new CopyChoreoExtensionTask(), isChoreoExtensionSkipped)   // copy the Choreo extension
                 .addTask(new CreateJarTask(skipCopyLibsFromDist))   // create the jar
                 .addTask(new CopyResourcesTask(), isSingleFileBuild)
+                .addTask(new CopyObservabilitySymbolsTask(), isSingleFileBuild)

replies.bodyText:
I think in all our test cases, this will be skipped. Because none of them has the build time flag or the Ballerina.toml table. (Except maybe in any test case which uses ballerina new).
I will confirm once the other "lang-server" related test case issue had been fixed.
replies.author: nadundesilva

replies.bodyText: Resolving as all the integrations are passing.
replies.author: nadundesilva

timeline.message: Merge remote-tracking branch 'upstream/master' into choreo-observability
Update invalid license header
Update GRPC Test Case to avoid VisibleSymbolVisitor issue

Merge pull request #24176 from nadundesilva/choreo-observability

Update GRPC Test Cases to avoid VisibleSymbolVisitor issue

Merge pull request #22235 from a5anka/periscope

Change default periscope hostname
Remove unwanted debug logs
Add info log to print observability backend

Merge pull request #22261 from a5anka/tracing-extension

Add info log to print observability backend
Improve error handling of the observerbilty collector
Remove spotbugs-exclude file
Update copyright header

Merge pull request #22222 from a5anka/choreo-compiler-extension-v3

Add observability compiler extension

Merge pull request #22216 from nadundesilva/appId-injection

Add appId into the telemetry proto definition
Remove unused variable

Merge pull request #22414 from a5anka/ast-extension

Fix spotbugs issue in the build
Update Sampling rate of traces to reduce tracing overhead
Update Choreo metrics reporter to only publish non zero values
Add support to add the exact HTTP status code into traces
Update how the observability error tags are added
Add support to report errors upon function call failures
Add check to not add reportError calls for non error return types

Disable ballerina-http-tests temporarily

# This was done because there is an OOM issue in the Observability Symbols collector. This test needs to be enabled back again after this is fixed

Merge pull request #22302 from nadundesilva/choreo-observability

Add support to report function execution errors in Observations
Refactor and move observability related desugar logic to JvmObservabilityGen class
Refactor and move service resource observations to Backend Desugar level
Refactor and move main method observations to Backend Desugar level
Refactor and move worker observations to Backend Desugar level
Remove unused observability logic in byte code gen phase

Revert changes done to ballerina based Jvm compiler backends

# Since now the Java based Jvm compiler backend is used, these changes will no longer be required.
Refactor and cleanup JvmObservabilityGen Class
Implement reporting errors from panic statements directly in the entry point function bodies

Merge pull request #22595 from nadundesilva/choreo-observability

Refactor and move all old Observability logic to Compiler Back-end Desugar phase
Merge remote-tracking branch 'upstream/master' into sync
Merge remote-tracking branch 'upstream/master' into sync
Add support for compiler BString mode in Observability Instrumentation

Merge pull request #22673 from nadundesilva/sync

Sync observability improvements branch with master branch
Add support to report panics propagated from calls and fp calls in entry point function bodies

Add support to fix error table entries after Observability Instrumentation

# When instrumenting Call, Async Call & FP Call instrunctions, if an error entry ends in the basic block being instrumented, the error entry gets messed up. This is fixed by updating the error entries to the last desugar BB added in the instrumentation.
Add support to report panics propagated through a Observed function
Add a unique ID to separate variables created for function body and invocation instrumentation

Merge pull request #22810 from nadundesilva/choreo-observability

Add support for error reporting for Panics

Add check to only instrument the body of resource functions in services

# This was previously done for all the functions which were not generated by the compiler. However, in ballerina a user may add a normal function to a service as well. Therefore, the check was updated to look for the Resource function flag
Add support to observe async calls
Refactor Observe start call generation function to support passing the maps operand directly

Fix minor bug in generating panic handlers

# After injecting the observe start and end calls, newCurrentBB contains the instruction being instrumented. The panic handler generation logic was updated to use newCurrentBB.
Add support for treating the self arg separately in creating functions for async calls
Break source.invocation_fqn tag into separate tags containing module name and position

Merge pull request #22901 from nadundesilva/choreo-observability

Add support to Observe Async Calls
Update Timer to ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor for publishing metrics
Update Timer to ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor for publishing trace spans
Add support for batching gRPC publish calls based on gRPC server frame limit
Add code review suggestions

Merge pull request #22944 from nadundesilva/choreo-observability

Improve batching in metrics and traces published
Update access modifier of the Observability constant to package private
Merge remote-tracking branch 'upstream/master' into sync

Merge pull request #23046 from nadundesilva/sync

Sync observability improvements branch with master branch
Add improvements to reduce the impact when Observability is off
Add actual object sub-type as the connector name

Change type info field into a method

# If a new field is added, it could mess up functionality such as object key iterations. Therefore, this was changed to a method which returns a constant value.
Refactor observability desugar generated functions

Update Choreo trace sampler to a rate limiting sampler

# The sampler was updated to only consider the trace sampling rate (number of sampled traces per second)

Merge pull request #23166 from nadundesilva/choreo-observability

Update observability connector type information to the actual sub type information
Merge remote-tracking branch 'upstream/master' into choreo-observability

Fix minor bug in handling errors in observable invocations

# Due to a new BB being introduced in the observable invocation instrumentation, the flow was broken. This was fixed and the code was adjusted to avoid this in the future.

Merge pull request #23298 from nadundesilva/choreo-observability

Sync observability improvements branch with master branch

Merge pull request #23428 from ballerina-platform/master

Sync observability improvements branch with master branch
Move global choreo config to $HOME/.config/choreo

Merge pull request #23460 from a5anka/choreo-extension

Move global choreo config to $HOME/.config/choreo

Re-enable MetricsTestCase

# This test case was disabled because it was previously broken when the tables were removed from ballerina

Re-enable Ballerina HTTP test cases

# This was previously disabled due to a OOM issue caused by the Observability Symbol Collector. The Observability Symbol Collector was improved and the test cases were re-enabled.

Merge pull request #23448 from nadundesilva/choreo-observability

Re-enable disabled test cases in Observability Improvements branch
Add gauge value metric to Choreo Metrics published

Merge pull request #23495 from nadundesilva/choreo-observability

Add gauge value metric to Choreo Metrics published
Merge remote-tracking branch 'upstream/master' into choreo-observability

Merge pull request #23517 from nadundesilva/choreo-observability

Sync observability improvements branch with master branch
Cleanup JvmObservabilityGen class
Improve TracingTestCase

Fix intermittent status code property set issue

# Since the status code property is set after calling the super class methods in the ClientConnectorListeners, the status code may or may not be set after the observations finishes. This was fixed by changing the order of the calls.
Fix code review suggestions

Merge pull request #23628 from nadundesilva/choreo-observability

Add improvements to Tracing Test Case
Use SHA-256 algo to create AST hash

Merge pull request #23667 from a5anka/ast-hash

Use SHA-256 algo to create AST hash
Fix checkstyle issues

Merge pull request #23677 from a5anka/ast-hash

Fix checkstyle issues
Update observability tags to be passed as constants in instrumentation
Update object actual type adding to use getClass() method of the ObjectValue
Separate resource and callable start injection to separate methods
Remove old Ballerina string implementation compatible methods from ObserveUtils
Move observability wrapper functions generated for async calls into package level

Merge pull request #23668 from nadundesilva/choreo-observability

Improve Observability BIR Manipulations
Merge remote-tracking branch 'upstream/master' into sync

Merge pull request #23698 from nadundesilva/sync

Sync observability improvements branch with master branch
Remove worker name from Observability data

Refactor and rename conenctorName and action to objectName and functionName

# Since now the functions attached to objects can also be observed, the naming in the relevant places were updated. With this change, only for non-connector objects, the tags will have object_name and function keys (similar to connect_name and action in connectors).
Refactor and move generic tags added to ObserveUtils class
Remove unused Observability Constants

Merge pull request #23730 from nadundesilva/choreo-observability

Improvements to the Observability Tags
Revert unwanted changes in observability-improvements branch

Merge pull request #23768 from nadundesilva/choreo-observability

Revert unwanted changes in observability-improvemnts branch
Refactor and Cleanup
Add guard against main tags set being modified

Revert changes done to .travis.yaml for observability-improvements branch

# Since observability-improvements branch had been maintained as a separate branch for several months, .travis.yaml was updated to run tests for the branch. These had been reverted.
Update Counter interface to support getting value and resetting value as an atomic operation
Add support to pass a set of constant tags to the Observation context from Ballerina Compiler

Add support to pass tags to the Observability Runtime from Compiler

Remove predefined height and width on lifeline labels
Avoid reading AST json unless required

Use status_code_group tag instead of status_code tag in http client

[Observability] Add additional tags to telemetry data from HTTP client

Sync Observability Improvements with master

Add observability start and end calls at the Compiler Backend Desugar phase
Remove error handling for errors in adding observability tags in http module
Update submodule logic
